values.description:

With the growth of our online services we also servicing an increasing number of foreign clients in America and parts of Europe.
values.name: Viper IT Solutions
Sophie Grillet
values.description:
Art and Cartoons by Sophie Grillet.
Sophie is an English artist who for the past 17 years has been living in Ann Arbor, Michigan.  She mostly paints in oils and acrylics, also working in 3D including stone and clay sculpture, and photography.

Occasionally Sophie takes on cartoon commissions, having been a successful cartoonist for books, magazines and national newspapers in the U.K., where she was a regular contributor to The Guardian newspaper.  Sophie attended Central School of Art (now University of the Arts, London) and is an arts graduate of the University of Brighton.

Sophie is a currently docent at the UoM Museum of Art (UMMA) where she provides tours for children and for adults, from university student groups with faculty to older adults suffering memory loss.

Being insatiably curious, Sophie is working on a grand attempt to integrate her interests in art, social justice, emotion, ecology, science, and math, but the journey has just begun. She likes to be mindful that what science seeks to describe, is Nature.  Her work reflects on the tragedy of our love of natural beauty and our haste to destroy it.

values.description:
Eko UK Ltd is a Brighton-based consultancy and software business. They understand and develop 
business processes before developing and deploying custom-fit technical solutions. This includes business / data analysis, creating business-centric software, mobile applications, bespoke administration systems, dynamic creative content, and even online stores. Eko’s clients include the United Nations, Endemol – the world’s largest independent television company, and the Citizens Advice Bureau.

High-End Interactive 3D for the Web and mobile.

We are an interactive studio based in Brighton, UK. We make 3D games and creative applications for the Web and mobile.

We believe in bringing the magic of interactive 3D to a broader audience, taking advantage of the latest technologies to build experiences that allow anyone to play, learn and create.

The studio partners with advertising agencies around the world to create engaging 3D content for the following cutting edge platforms:

iPhone, iPad and Android using the Unity game engine.
Unity Web Player for the best 3D experience inside a browser.
WebGL for native 3D graphics in the next generation of browsers.

values.description:
We optimise websites across different devices to convert more visitors into customers

We're a small team made up of some of the best senior Conversion Rate Optimisation and Usability practitioners in the country. We're based in Manchester and have clients in Edinburgh, Brighton, Manchester, London and even Switzerland. 

We work with some of the UK’s most well respected brands including AllSaints, Schuh, Lakeland, The North Face, Vans, British Cycling, Molton Brown and Speedo to name a few.

We work with all of our clients in a collaborative and transparent way which means we share everything from key learning’s that can help shape future decisions for the business, to how we run our Conversion Rate Optimisation programme so your internal teams can learn from us.


For more information get in touch with us – optimisation@prwd.co.uk
values.name: PRWD
Draper City
values.description:
Draper City is ideally situated halfway between Salt Lake City and Provo, just 20 miles from the Salt Lake International Airport.   The city is located in the southeast section of the Salt Lake Valley, resting against the base of the Wasatch Mountains. 

Draper City is one of the top hang gliding areas in the nation.  There are many city trails and nearby mountain trails for mountain biking and hiking.  

Utah is famous for its light, powder snow, and a stay in Draper provides access to nearby ski resorts:  Alta, Snowbird, Brighton and Solitude (just 15 miles east of Draper.)   

Draper is now becoming a retail shopping locale.  A new IKEA store will be opening in the spring of 2007.  Draper Peaks shopping center has numerous shops and restaurants.

A provider of comprehensive, high quality, affordable primary health care to the residents of Allston/Brighton, Waltham and surrounding communities regardless of their ability to pay. A leader in the fight against health disparities in our communities

City Realty Group
values.description:
City Realty Group LLC is a premier full service real estate company based in Boston. 
The company is lead by several veteran real estate professionals focused on most disciplines of real estate.

City Realty Group can assist customers buying selling, managing & leasing both commercial & residential property in the greater Boston area. 

Our company goal is to provide value added service and tireless pursuit of our customers best interest whether buying, selling, leasing or managing real estate.

City Realty Group is also a proud member of the Greater Boston Association of Realtors (GBAR).

We have 4 offices and counting (Brighton, Allston, Jamaica Plain, Lynn and Fenway is opening in Jan 2009). Currently we are hiring Real Estate Agents for all locations. Not licensed as a real estate agent in MA? City Realty is a branch of AAA Statewide Real Estate School and can certify you for the state exam.
